blog.name: the-star-flower
blog.title: Aster Malfoy
blog.description: Ask Box: OPEN | Mod is 24 | Hufflepuff/Papillonlisse | OC Blog | Harry Potter AU | Drarry Child | Beauxbatons Academy Student |

body:
Family Connections Explained

OOC: In the recent post, I introduced Lesandra Selwyn (née Rosier), who is Diana’s maternal grandmother. Well there is a deeper family connection.

Lesandra’s father was a Rosier Wizard, and Narcissa’s Mother was a Rosier Witch.

Lesandra And Narcissa are first-cousins as they share grandparents.

Diana is also related to Harry Potter via her father being his cousin and being adopted by Harry Potter.

The wizarding world needs to really spread out lol.

Also fun fact, Daniella (aka the baby) unintentionally follows a strange naming pattern by having “Ella” in her name. Examples of this are “Durella Rosier” And “Bellatrix Black.”

Another fun fact (this one is intentional) Daisy follows Aster’s and Narcissa’s naming convention of a flower. The Daisy is part of the Asteraceae family, a wildflower that is related to Asters.

summary: I know, boggarts in Hogwarts especially in DADA isn't a common thing, it was only Remus' idea - but let's be honest, it's a...
body:
I know, boggarts in Hogwarts especially in DADA isn’t a common thing, it was only Remus’ idea - but let’s be honest, it’s a really common piece of character-knowledge formula. And I am sure every HP fan at least had one thought about what would be their biggest fear. Of course I am too.

Kendra was nevously stand in front of that stupid wardrobe. Her wand was in her hand, pointing out to the door, waiting for the boggart to show her biggest, darkest fear. Of course she was curious but at the same time it was terrifying that everybody in that room would know her secret fear. What if it’s something embrassing? Like… naked herself or something worst. Or she just can’t make it funny and it became really embarrassing. Maybe she should learn from the victorian ladies and faint…

The door opened slowly and some kind of dark fog started to forming in the room. Darker than a simple smoke, thicker than the smog of London. It started to spare in the room in every direction, for that big that she needed to realize she can’t see the facilities anymore. All was… just black.

What? She likes black! “What is this thing?” told a girl to somebody. “She is afraid of… the darkness? How silly! She is always in the dark alone!”

“Maybe that’s why.”

“But…”

Kendra looked to the darkness. It wasn’t scarry at all. She even felt herself good in it. How that’s possible?! What is wrong with her?! She should be frightened!

“I… I don’t understand… I am not afraid of dark…” said she and started to turn to the teacher to ask what happened. But she didn’t see anybody near to her. Where are they? She heared the voices, but she doesn’t saw… she raised her hands in front of her eyes and she just realized she don’t see her own hands. Her heart started to beat faster. It is not the darkness she sees - she don’t see anything at all! She lost her total vision, but still heared the classmates talkings so she know she isn’t separated from them.

She lost her eyes. Her vison. How in the possible way could she make it less scary?!

“It is okay Kendra” heared the teacher “you are okay. It is only a boggart - what do you see?”

“Nothing” said Kendra by a shaing voice. “I can’t see nothing at all…!”

“But here it is this big thing” said one other classmate.

“No, I mean I know. But it isn’t the darkness. I am became totally blind…”

“Oh” got the answer. Unluckily it was from their teacher. “Not an easy stuff right?”

Kendra felt she could start a histerical laught, but she was sure that doesn’t help at all.

“Do not concentrate to the exact meaning of that…stuff… just try to see… oh not a good world, well imagine it as an object. It is a big fluffy pillow stuff.”

“Fluffy?… Oh!… Well, maybe… I think I have an idea. Riddiculus!” said Kendra, and for a moment nothing changed. Than Kendra reached out and pulled of a piece of that stuff. It was a big pile of dark bubbles like a big bubble bath. The giant bubble wall started to came apart and became flying bubbles. Kendra started to smiling, and even laughting when a big bubble fell on her nose.

So after all the lesson wasn’t bad. She could think of it as she win over her fear but insted of the overhelming winner feeling, she just felt herself bad. Maybe it was better when she didn’t know what she fears the most.

blog.name: accioweasleys
blog.title: a lot of stuff
blog.description: basically harry potter + game of thrones + lord of the rings

summary: --- 19 years later--- at about 12am ... Hermione: oh my god, draco, draco oh no oh no my water broke !!! Draco: WHERE’S MY SON...
body:
— 19 years later—


at about 12am …


Hermione: oh my god, draco, draco oh no oh no my water broke !!!

Draco: WHERE’S MY SON GRANGER I CANT SEE HIM COMING OUT

Granger: yoU DUMB SON A FERRET BRING ME TO THE DAMN HOSPITAL

Draco: oH right (holding out his arm) i really hope our son doesn’t turn out delusional like you

Hermione: DO YOU EXPECT ME TO FUCKING APPARATE WHEN IM GOING TO POP WITH A BABY INSIDE ME, WE ARE TAKING THE CAR DRACO

Draco: (panics and starts searching for the car keys)

Hermione: ARE YOU A WIZARD OR WHAT. (in the know it all voice) honestly draco accio

Draco: Granger, you know I should call She-Weasel because I don’t think I can drive there-

Hermione: I’VE HAD ENOUGH OF YOUR NONSENSE DRACO SILENCIO. NOW GET IN THE FUCKING CAR AND I’LL DRIVE 

– after Hermione gives birth–


Harry: aww, he looks like a younger version of Malfoy Mione, where is he though?

Hermione: (looking smug) stupefied in the cupboard

Harry: (opens the cupboard to see a scared Malfoy)

Hermione: you’re doing great sweetie, just an hour more !

blog.name: drarry--headcanons
blog.title: Drarry Headcanons♡
blog.description:
Headcanons: son situaciones inventadas por un/una seguidor/a que no pasan en el relato oficial.
No todos los headcanons son míos.

summary:
Scorpius: abuelo, creo que estoy enamorado de Albus Potter.
Lucius: dejame adivinar
Draco: ...
Lucius: es por sus hermosos ojos...
body:
Scorpius: abuelo, creo que estoy enamorado de Albus Potter.

Lucius: dejame adivinar

Draco: …

Lucius: es por sus hermosos ojos verdes

Draco: …

Lucius: y por que su tono de piel es perfecto

Draco: …

Lucius: y por que es muy valiente y muy lindo

Scorpius: si! como lo sabes?

*Draco y Lucius lo miran*

Draco: en mi defensa, olvidaste mencionar su increible y revoltoso cabello

body:

Draco: tu novio es mucho mas guapo que el mio *se va*

blog.name: 12dancingwizards
blog.title: Sirius Black Is Gay
blog.description:
Jk Rowling who? Idk her.

All the characters are now queer poc and anyone who disagrees can fight me. I’m here for positivity about all the houses and running Snape over with my truck. Asks, messages, and submissions are super welcome!! I wanna interact with my followers!

Mod is a lesbian nonbinary slytherin if you were wondering. They/them pronouns please!

Also this is a sideblog. Main is @glitch-h Icon credit: @alessiajontrunfio

tags: i was just thinking u know how it is
summary:
“The Boy Who Lived”
It was a title that always say uncomfortably with Harry. For the most part he thought it was due to the...
body:
“The Boy Who Lived”

It was a title that always say uncomfortably with Harry. For the most part he thought it was due to the whole “prophecy” and “getting his life taken away from him” thing that made him squirm when he heard the phrase. That made sense. He didn’t want to be the Boy Who Lived. He just wanted to be Harry.

Except…. except he didn’t just dislike the one phrase. When the kind old wizard at the tavern called him “young man”, Harry smiled politely but he felt his heart sink. When Hagrid addressed him as “boy” he mostly felt affection for his friend, but he also felt a kick in the ribs.

It took a long time, but eventually, Harry realized that the problem was that he wasn’t a “He”. That, though the prophecy would still suck, maybe he’d have been more comfortable being known as the Girl Who Lived. She mentioned something to hermione who smiled and informed her that she’d had a sneaking suspicion but hadn’t wanted to say anything, but also that she had her love no matter what.

Harry didn’t want to keep herself a secret, so she spoke to Ron, who was a bit shocked but still made sure she knew he would always be his best friend, and then Luna, who nodded sagely and said that many things are found later than expected, and soon all of Harry’s close friends and family knew. Then the Daily Prophet caught wind and the whole wizarding world knew.

And there was backlash especially from pureblood families but Harry had her loved ones (and besides she was used to hostility from the wizarding world. As if that wasn’t her whole life story)

body:
Period

Wait, do witches use sanitary napkins? Cuz, we saw that a lot of muggles things aren’t even known in the Wizarding World, so how do the witches deal whit their periods?

blog.name: wynnefic
blog.title: wherever you go, there you are
blog.description: Wynne, @wynnebat on AO3. Writing, reading, and other terrible life choices.

body:
Fic Recs

Call Me Mary Poppins by Triangulum

Teen Wolf, Chris/Peter/fem!Stiles, 37k, complete, rule 63, nanny/employers, explicit, OTP to OT3, pregnancy

Chris pinches the bridge of his nose and says, “You’re telling me you want to fuck the nanny?”

“Don’t be ridiculous, it’s nothing as stereotypical as that, Christopher. This isn’t porn. I want to seduce her,” Peter says.

Or

A Stetopher nanny AU that wasn’t really asked for.

Faith and the Devil by Lapsed Pacifist

Harry Potter, SI & Malfoy family, 63k, WIP, self-insert, family, de-aging

It was eleven AM on a Saturday and I was sitting at the desk, spreading a disappointing Vegemite substitute across an equally disappointing piece of gluten free toast. The only thing that wasn’t innately disappointing was that I’d made a very good cup of tea. It was still steaming in my giant, garish mug and I was counting on it to make this breakfast worth getting up for.

Less than an hour later, Lucius Malfoy would be trying to convince me I was his long lost daughter.

we are the things that leave no mark by Tozette

MCU, JARVIS/Pepper, 2k, complete, soulmate AU

It’s actually Jarvis who hires Pepper, like a strange, prophetic coincidence. He sorts through resumes, asks prying questions while using Tony Stark’s email address – he combs electronic fingers through every aspect of each candidate’s life.

By the time he has a top five, honestly, Jarvis could pick any one of the candidates at random and be assured of a top-end, over-qualified, extremely patient PA. Any of them could do the job and do it competently.

He picks Pepper for her turn of phrase, for the force of personality in her writing – and also because she has ‘Pingala’s binary’ in her search history side by side with a shoe-shopping wishlist the length of her forearm. We all have our quirks.

Dirt and Ashes, or: The One-and-a-Half Body Problem by Tozette

Naruto, Sakura & Hidan, 90k, complete, canon AU, post-apocalypse, torture, gore, immortality, mentorship, Jashinism

The invasion of Konoha during the chuunin exam didn’t fail. Team seven is broken, people are dead, and Sakura is hurt and frightened and a very long way from home.

Alternative summary: In which Sakura carries half of Hidan across two countries, leaving a trail of blood, bodies, and other people’s legs.

The Matchmaker by Green

Teen Wolf, Peter/Chris/Stiles, 1k, complete, werewolves are known AU, first meetings, OTP to OT3, soulmate AU

Two men are standing in his waiting room, both of them looking like they walked out of one of Stiles’s wet dreams.

“Are you here for matchmaking?” Stiles asks once he’s stopped ogling and remembered he’s a professional.

blog.name: myboggartisunrequitedlove
blog.title: I Know It Sounds Riddikulus
blog.description: I stan Remus John Lupin, Obi Wan Kenobi, and Diego Hargreeves. They deserve to be HAPPY.

tags: harry potter and the sorcerer’s stone
body:
Snape’s Birthday!

Since it is his birthday, then I would like to share my thoughts on Severus!


While I don’t really condone his actions on his students. Don’t get me wrong, I get where he came from and everything but at the same time he is an adult and he should be more responsible and have a better judgement on things.



In spite of that, I do admire him, even more than Hermione, intelligence-wise. I admire his intelligence and innovative character. In which I understand is that he knows a lot of spells at a young age and invented spells too.




Conclusion:

I see that people are 50/50 between liking Snape as a character or not. As for me, his moral is not the best at most times when you were exposed of his character. There are times when he had shown to be more pleasant, but the contrary was implied even more throughout the book.




I apologise if my statement is not a 100% accurate due to the fact that I have not finish the series yet. I just think it is appropriate to type this down since it is his birthday. All in all, not every character in Harry Potter is perfect, there are always good and bad in most of them.


So, Happy Birthday to Severus Snape!


Cheers!
